description: Adds or updates an inline policy document that is embedded in the specified IAM role.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: By modifying the IAM role policies, attackers can ensure valid credentials maintain elevated permissions for later use.
Attackers may modify IAM role policies to cover their tracks, making it difficult to detect unauthorized actions.
Modifying IAM role policies can be used to restrict or remove access to certain users or roles, aiding in defense evasion.

securityImplications: Attackers might use PutRolePolicy to modify permissions of IAM roles, potentially granting unauthorized access to AWS resources.
